about.summary: the LIBpcap interface to various kernel packet capture mechanism

name: libpcap
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "libpcap" %}
{% set version = "1.9.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "2edb88808e5913fdaa8e9c1fcaf272e19b2485338742b5074b9fe44d68f37019" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: http://www.tcpdump.org/release/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1000
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - flex
    - bison
    - m4

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libpcap.so      # [linux]
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libpcap.dylib   # [osx]
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/pcap.h      # [unix]

about:
  home: www.tcpdump.org
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'the LIBpcap interface to various kernel packet capture mechanism'
  doc_url: http://www.tcpdump.org/#documentation
  dev_url: https://github.com/the-tcpdump-group/libpcap

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nehaljwani
